projects.title: Design Rules for underpass Van Hertumweg Goes
projects.description: Quality Plan and Design Rule Documents for the underpass Van Hertumweg in Goes on behalf of the community of Goes. The project exists of the preparation of draft rules for an underpass in the direct vicinity of the train station of Goes. As a consequence of the making of the underpass is the adjustment of the south entrance of the train station and the reduction of the bus station. The Design Rules Documents are part of the file transfer for Tunnel Alliance (ProRail).

contributors.headline: Urban designer at municipality of Breda and lecturer at Avans

projects.title: Workshop Station Semarang Tawang for P.T. Kereta Api (Indonesian Railways) commissioned by National Office of Cultural Heritage.
projects.description:
Due to recent carrying out of civil works the historic town of Semarang will no longer flood regularly. Still there are plans of the Ministry of Infrastructure to expand the rail infrastructure at the site of Semarang Tawang station. The Indonesian Railway Company wants to examine what the consequences are for the historic station building. Simultaneously the Semarang municipality wants the historic town be nominated as UNESCO World Heritage Site. Refurbishing the station and area could give opportunities for restructuring the historic city. Various stakeholders are brought together in a workshop  to explore each other's problems and challenges. The definition of a common goal will help the proces of working together. 
The contribution of Movares consists of the insertion of knowledge in the field of transfers, track knowledge and the relationship between station and town. (In collaboration with Hylkema Consultants and Van Mourik Architecten)
http://heritage.kereta-api.co.id/?p=6777

projects.title: Ontwikkelstrategie stationsgebied Nuth
projects.description:
Development strategy station area Nuth
Nuth Station is located on the edge of the core Nuth, cut off by highway A76 from the rest of the village and therefore somewhat isolated. The bus does not stop at the station and the splendid setting of the Geleenbeek is not accessible from the station. Because of the construction of the new Buitenring the access of the village will radically change. This offers opportunities and threats. Parkstad Limburg and the municipality of Nuth would like to see an improvement in the positioning of the station within the network of routes and also they want to transform the environment of the train station into an interesting and vibrant spot for both residents, travelers and tourists. 
By analyzing the network of routes and paths with the help of space syntax we would investigate the possibilities for a better integration of the station area.

contributors.headline: Urban designer at municipality of Breda and lecturer at Avans

projects.title: Tramverbinding De Uithoflijn
projects.description:
Tram track De Uithof
The improvement of the public transport connection from Utrecht central station to Utrecht University De Uithof will become a new tram track. Now on this connection every three minutes runs a double articulated bus. The tram track will be linked for a major part to the existing train tracks, then bends down over Maarschalkerweerd to De Uithof. The tram track will there be part of the public space in the heart of the University Campus. Integration requires a critical attitude and a high level of detailing and cooperation with the different techniques that has to be used. My work consisted in the DO phase of the track to tune the design with the Utrecht University and the University Medical Center.

projects.title: Uithoflijn Utrecht
projects.description:
De Uithoflijn is een belangrijk onderdeel van een netwerk van Hoogwaardige Openbaar Vervoer banen en verbindt het Centraal Station Utrecht met De Uithof. Tussen deze twee plekken ontstaat een snelle, comfortabele en milieuvriendelijke verbinding. Daar profiteren straks per dag 40.000 reizigers van. Hierdoor wordt de bereikbaarheid van De Uithof, de leefbaarheid van de binnenstad en de kwaliteit van het openbaar vervoer verbeterd. 

Supervisor / Project integration tram line to the Uithof in De Uithof, commissioned by the Project Organisation Uithof Line (POUHL). Part of this assignment was to monitor environmental qualities in the tender document. Consultation of stakeholders, Utrecht University and the Academic Medical Center tend to get support for the inbedding of the tram line in the Uithof Area. In particular, the embedding of the tram in the crowded public space of the  Heidelberglaan is critical.

projects.title: Upgrading possibilities for Dordrecht South Station
projects.description: Research on upgrading possibilities of Dordrecht South Station in order to achieve a comparison between upgrading of the existing station or relocation of the station to the location Copernicusweg commissioned by the city of Dordrecht. Considering the bad customer satisfaction and the feeling of social insecurity at the station, the study emphasises on spatial and functionel adjustments. The study was developed in cooperation with NS, ProRail and Spoorbouwmeester to ensure support for the solutions.

projects.title: RE - CREATING IDENTITY: LANDSCAPING the CONNECTION
projects.description:
How to create a meaningful station environment in an era in which the classical station typology is evaporating? Modern travelling, being almost immaterial, has become ‘traveling light’: no need to buy tickets anymore, paying with your cell phone, high frequent intensities of train systems preventing you to wait for long. This modern comfort raises only a question: what is left of the iconography and identity of a station(area) with less and less station program? Apparently there still is a need for identity. Most cities, especially the small scale ones still feel a urge to interpret the station area as one of the meaningful focus points in the urban scheme. In the case of the central station of Helmond there is not only the ambition is to create an attractive entrance to the city but at the same time is was a necessity to develop also an interesting connection between the historical centre of city centre in the north and a newly shaped urban area at a former industrial site at the Southside of the railway tracks.
The project is been rewarded for an International Brunel Award in 2014

projects.title: Refurbishing streets in the historic city center of Weesp
projects.description: Designer of the refurbished streets Nieuwstad and Breedstraat in the historic core of the town of Weesp. The project is characterized by a fixed deadline to tender the work for November 1, 2013 and to help the municipality regarding the participation process with residents and users. Because of the short time the process focussed on intensive group meetings during the summer period in which possibilities ans limitations are discussed. Residents could indicate problems and needs. The advisory board established the design. Obtaining support of Welstand was also part of the job. The project has been developed to a high level of detail in order to gain sufficient assurance of the quality in implementation; 1: 200 with details of street patterns. The project is realized.

projects.title: BrabantStad
projects.description: BrabantStad is het stedelijk netwerk van de vijf grote Brabantse steden Breda, Eindhoven, Helmond, ’s-Hertogenbosch en Tilburg én de provincie Noord-Brabant. Samen werken deze aan een internationaal concurrerend en duurzaam stedelijk netwerk. Als lid van het programmateam BrabantStad was mijn rol het ver(k)nopen en verbinden van de maatschappelijke en ruimtelijke opgaven in Helmond aan de regionale en rijksagenda.

profile_positions.description: From 2015 the minor urban renewal made a new start. 17 students are working on an assignment from the municipality of 's Hertogenbosch in the Spoorzone. They get support of the Province Noord Brabant in Werkplaats De Gruyter.
profile_positions.title: Co-ordinator minor urban renewal

profile_positions.description: My contribution to the course program of the Academy of Building and Infrastructure (AB&I) currently consists of Allotment and Land development, Aspects of Allotment, Architecture and Image Quality and Municipal Housing Policy. In addition, I am involved with supervision of students, guest lectures and positioning urban design within the AB&I. The thread for me is how my urban competencies can help other disciplines in  construction and real estate. Integration is the main subject. Urban designers search the integrality by making drawings and sketches. Therefore they can help others to discover integrality from their point of view and let them see the main goal to work on.
profile_positions.title: University lecturer Urbanism and public space

profile_positions.description: Co-ordination of the minor urban renewal at ABM Tilburg ; teaching and coaching of the students, cooperate with other institutes that use the same minor, contacts with the SURF organisation, contacts with the professional commissioner
profile_positions.title: Co-ordinator minor urban renewal

profile_positions.description: The role of planning is that of integrator between design, engineering and feasibility in order to make something better AND beautiful. Proud of the results is what counts! The design / the drawing is the catalyst to unite various interests into a coherent whole and to be higher than the sum of its parts. Keywords are: together, support, integral and ambition. Devising and implementing a plan is a process that you go through together. Enthusiasm and creativity enables Ivo to provide such a process in the right direction and to keep on track.
profile_positions.title: Urban designer

profile_positions.description: Half of the credits of the students of the Academy of Architecture and Urban Design is achieved in practice. Practice portfolios are assessed by a small team of professionals once a year.
profile_positions.title: Assessor practice portfolios
